from sys import stdin
def gcd(a,b):
	if b==0:
		return a
	else:
		return gcd(b,a%b)


def solve(a,b):
	if b==1:
		return True
	d=gcd(a,b)
	if d==1:
		return False
	else:
		return solve(a,b/d)


t=int(stdin.readline())
for i in range(0,t):
	a,b=map(int,stdin.readline().split())
	if solve(a,b):
		print "Yes"
	else:
		print "No"
